verbs.description: [ARG0: iranistan avenue fire] [V: sends] [ARG1: one] [ARG2: to hospital] a fire at an iranistan avenue residence sent one person to the hospital but fortunately did not force residents from their homes according to the bridgeport fire department firefighters responded to a structure fire at 1084 - 1086 iranistan ave at 3 44 p m sunday the fire reportedly started on the front porch and high wind was a factor nine residents were home at the time of the fire according to the fire department a neighbor tried to put out the fire with a garden hose and was later transported to st vincent medical centerin bridgeport for smoke inhalation no other injuries were reported the fire marshal office is investigating residents were able to remain in their home fire marshal office smoke inhalation bridgeport connecticut bridgeport bridgeport fire department st vincents medical centerin bridgeport st vincent medical centerin bridgeport
